## Exploring data in R

```{r}
# load libraries
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)

# Check
#view(penguins)
names(penguins)

# Check dimensions
dim(penguins)

# Get summary
summary(penguins)

# Get summary with skimr
skimr::skim(penguins)

# Print first/last 6 rows
head(penguins)
tail(penguins)

# Make a pairplot
# GGally::ggpairs(penguins)

# Make pairplot with a select number of columns and color by species
GGally::ggpairs(penguins, columns = 3:6, ggplot2::aes(color = species))

# Make a histogram of penguin flipper lengths
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
